AutoDriveEditor.version_notes:
Update to v1.1.0

Improved

  • Added support for Quartic Bézier Curves with two endpoints and three control points.
  • Implemented a new Quartic Curve icon and integrated it with the curve editor.
  • Updated hit detection, selection, and movement logic for quartic curve control points.
  • Improved overall state management when switching between cubic, quad, and quartic curves.
  • Added support for Quintic Bézier Curves with two endpoints and four control points.
  • Implemented a new Quintic Curve icon and integrated it with the curve editor.
  • Enhanced hit detection, selection, and movement logic for quintic curve control points.
  • Refined curve rendering to ensure smooth transitions between all curve types.
